name: bloglist-ci-cd
description: App used to implement pipeline for Full Stack Open's CI/CD module

scripts.build: cd ./backend && rm -rf ./build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r ./build ../backend
scripts.install: cd ./backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.eslint: cd ./backend && npm run eslint && cd ../frontend && npm run eslint

author: cragtok
